adDetails: CA License # 013049 DiSalvo Landscaping and Design DiSalvo Landscaping Services is a family owned/operated business. With years of experience in the field, we plan to bring our expertise skills with affordable pricing to your yard or property. Pet friendly, flexible scheduling and always on time, DiSalvo Landscaping can take care of all your property needs. From summer clean ups to full service maintenance, there's no job too big or small. Our team will ensure you enjoy your yard this summer, and more to come!
